')pkglineflag    client.send("Hello")pkglineflagpkglineflagdef apply(cmds):pkglineflag    # webgooz apply --process create --file config.jsonpkglineflag    blueprint = EngineTemplate.parameter_parser(cmds)pkglineflag    if blueprint["--process"] == "create":pkglineflag        f = open(blueprint["--file"],"r")pkglineflag        content = f.read()pkglineflag        f.close()pkglineflag        payload = ujson.loads(content)pkglineflag        for api in payload["apis"]:pkglineflag            paths = api["filename"].split("/")pkglineflag            osPath = "/app/webgooz"pkglineflag            for mkpath_counter in range(1,len(paths)-1):pkglineflag                try:pkglineflag                    osPath += "/"pkglineflag                    osPath += paths[mkpath_counter]pkglineflag                    os.mkdir(osPath)pkglineflag                except Exception:pkglineflag                    passpkglineflag            f = open("/app/webgooz"+api["filename"],"w")pkglineflag            f.write(api["codes"].replace("backendlineflag","
